Title: The Stewmaker (No. 161)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Patrick Massett, John Zinman, Brandon Sonnier (staff writer), Brandon Margolis (staff writer)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: When a witness in the murder trial of a ruthless cartel boss disappears, Red (James Spader) leads Liz (Megan Boone) and Ressler (Diego Klattenhoff) on a search for the Blacklist's No. 161, a gruesome hit man known as the Stewmaker.
